bugs.summary: Cover more cases where we need a reason for WebRender initialization failures (again)

bugs.summary: CSP-blocked images have `display: none !important` UA style
apz side smooth scroll physics is different from main thread

fix tests to handle desktop zooming scrollbars

Factor out repeated logic in Picture-in-Picture tests
